attributes.action: change the law to stop fishermen from throwing back perfectly good dead fish back into the sea.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment fishermen are having to throw perfectly good dead fish back into the sea because of their quoter or not being allow to carry that type. I am wishing to stop this pointless waste and change this for the better so that this fish can be kept for consumption.
